# PaymentCardReaderSession.ReadError.nfcDisabled

**Case**

NFC is disabled on the device.

## Declaration

```swift
case nfcDisabled
```

## Discussion

The Tap to Pay on iPhone sheet displayed an error message asking the user to enable their NFC.

## Getting the error

- **PaymentCardReaderSession.ReadError.cardReadFailed**: An error occurred when reading the card.
- **PaymentCardReaderSession.ReadError.invalidAmount**: The request contained an invalid amount.
- **PaymentCardReaderSession.ReadError.invalidCurrencyCode**: The request included an invalid currency code.
- **PaymentCardReaderSession.ReadError.invalidPreferredAID**: The preferred AID specified in the transaction request is invalid.
- **PaymentCardReaderSession.ReadError.invalidVASMerchants(_:)**: The specified list of VAS merchants list is invalid.
- **PaymentCardReaderSession.ReadError.invalidVASRequestParameters(_:)**: The specified VAS parameters are invalid.
- **PaymentCardReaderSession.ReadError.noReaderSession**: No reader session available or the session isn’t ready.
- **PaymentCardReaderSession.ReadError.passcodeDisabled**: Read operations aren’t allowed when the device’s passcode is disabled.
- **PaymentCardReaderSession.ReadError.paymentCardDeclined**: The payment card declined the transaction.
- **PaymentCardReaderSession.ReadError.paymentReadFailed**: An internal failure prevented the read operation.
- **PaymentCardReaderSession.ReadError.pinCancelled**: The current PIN capture was cancelled, also cancelling any ongoing read operation.
- **PaymentCardReaderSession.ReadError.pinNotAllowed**: The time window allowed for a PIN capture after a card read has expired or requesting the PIN is simply not supported by your current configuration.
- **PaymentCardReaderSession.ReadError.pinEntryFailed**: An error occurred when capturing the PIN.
- **PaymentCardReaderSession.ReadError.pinEntryTimeout**: The current PIN capture was not completed in allowed time.
- **PaymentCardReaderSession.ReadError.pinTokenInvalid**: An error that indicates an invalid PIN token.
